entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:12 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 8:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
